term.title: collision cross-section

item.text: In simple hard sphere collision theory the area of the circle with radius equal to the collision diameter.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 158 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
